name: @tellescope/sdk
description: Code for interacting with the Tellescope API

scripts.test: npm run-script build:cjs && npm run-script retest-sockets && npm run-script retest-api
scripts.retest: npm run-script retest-sockets && npm run-script retest-api
scripts.test-api: npm run-script build:cjs && npm run-script retest-api
scripts.test-sockets: npm run-script build:cjs && npm run-script retest-sockets
scripts.build: npm run-script build:esm && npm run-script build:cjs
scripts.watch: nodemon --ignore lib --ext ts --exec npm run-script build

author: Sebastian Coates
